name: Bumper cops
description:
Bumper Cops is a high speed, endless police chase that will put your driving skills to test. Dodge through the traffic and speed through the streets to catch and bump the robbers from behind. You play as the hero police, racing through the busy traffic and arresting the robbers.🚨

🏎️ How to play
▪️ Slide to move the car, change lanes or move through the traffic
▪️ Tap to use the powerups

🚨BUMPER COPS FEATURES
▪️ Endless runner
▪️ Simple controls of slide and tap.
▪️ Smart and dense traffic
▪️ Powerups - NOS, Police siren and Shield
▪️ Air support for tight situations
▪️ Leaderboard
▪️ Quirky weapons like boxing glove, antlers and baseball bat
▪️ Customization options for 10 different cars

Bumper cops is developed by Tiny Bits studios.
